original_text: If there be yet many years behind, according unto them he shall give again the price of his redemption out of the money that he was bought for.
korean_text: 만일 남은 해가 많으면 그 연수대로 팔린 값에서 속량하는 값을 그 사람에게 도로 주고

sentences.original_text: If there be yet many years behind
according unto them he shall give again
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 따라 그는 다시 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: out of the money that he was bought for
